item.title: World Bank estimates $216B needed to rebuild Syria after civil war
item.description: The World Bank says rebuilding Syria after over a decade of civil war could cost about $216 billion

item.title: Ukrainians brace for another winter of power cuts as Russia shifts tactics
item.description: Millions of Ukrainians are preparing for another winter of blackouts as Russia renews its strikes on the countryâ€™s energy grid

item.title: World markets are mostly higher after Wall Street rally
item.description: Shares in Europe and Asia are mostly higher, with Japan's benchmark creeping closer to the symbolically important 50,000 level as conservative lawmake...

item.title: Firefighters contain blaze at Hungary's main oil refinery
item.description: Firefighters in Hungary have contained a fire at the country's main oil refinery, according to authorities and the energy company MOL

item.title: US and Australia sign critical-minerals agreement as a way to counter China
item.description: President Donald Trump and Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese have signed a critical-minerals deal at the White House
